price: 14 Goûtez donc ce châtiment ici-bas ! Et sachez que les mécréants sont voués aux tourments de l’Enfer.
arabic: ذَٰلِكُمۡ فَذُوقُوهُ وَأَنَّ لِلۡكَٰفِرِينَ عَذَابَ ٱلنَّارِ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: dhālikum fadhūqūhu wa-anna lil'kāfirīna ʿadhāba al-nāri
